title: Science Inquiry Skill Transfer Enhancement Program Through Error Prevention Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science laboratory procedures and observational skills
context.additional_context: A course designed to apply error-prevention strategies in experimental environments using VR simulations, enabling knowledge transfer to real scientific inquiry scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce error rates by 30% using training wheels (task examples + principle-based guidance) in VR simulation experiments
Learners can achieve over 80% proficiency in independently performing complex scientific experiment procedures through scaffolded step-by-step support
Learners can apply error-prevention strategies acquired during training to actual scientific inquiry tasks, improving problem-solving accuracy by 40%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
